scripts.dev: cd ../.. && cargo watch -i 'packages/wasm/pkg/*' -s 'wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir packages/wasm/pkg crates/shotoku-zei-wasm'
scripts.build: cd ../.. && wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir packages/wasm/pkg crates/shotoku-zei-wasm
scripts.build:node: cd ../.. && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir packages/wasm/pkg-node crates/shotoku-zei-wasm
scripts.build:web: cd ../.. && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir packages/wasm/pkg crates/shotoku-zei-wasm
